mn130:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn130:2.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dve agara sadvara, tattha cakkhuma puriso majjhe thito passeyya manusse geham pavisantepi nikkhamantepi anucankamantepi anuvicarantepi;
mn130:2.2: evameva kho aham, bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passami cavamane upapajjamane hine panite suvanne dubbanne, sugate duggate yathakammupage satte pajanami: ‘ime vata bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana; te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna. Ime va pana bhonto satta kayasucaritena samannagata vacisucaritena samannagata manosucaritena samannagata ariyanam anupavadaka sammaditthika sammaditthikammasamadana; te kayassa bheda param marana manussesu upapanna. Ime vata bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana; te kayassa bheda param marana pettivisayam upapanna. Ime va pana bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana; te kayassa bheda param marana tiracchanayonim upapanna. Ime va pana bhonto satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana; te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna’ti.
mn130:3.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala nanabahasu gahetva yamassa ranno dassenti:
mn130:3.2: ‘ayam, deva, puriso amatteyyo apetteyyo asamanno abrahmanno, na kule jetthapacayi.
mn130:3.4: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja pathamam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
mn130:3.5: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu pathamam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
mn130:4.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu daharam kumaram mandam uttanaseyyakam sake muttakarise palipannam semanan’ti?
mn130:4.6: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
mn130:4.7: ahampi khomhi jatidhammo, jatim anatito. Handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa’ti?
mn130:4.11: ‘ambho purisa, pamadavataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
mn130:4.12: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
mn130:4.13: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam, tayavetam papakammam katam, tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
mn130:5.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja pathamam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva dutiyam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
mn130:5.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu dutiyam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
mn130:5.6: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu itthim va purisam va (…) jinnam gopanasivankam bhoggam dandaparayanam pavedhamanam gacchantam aturam gatayobbanam khandadantam palitakesam vilunam khalitasiram valinam tilakahatagattan’ti?
mn130:5.10: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
mn130:5.11: ahampi khomhi jaradhammo, jaram anatito. Handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa’ti?
mn130:5.15: ‘ambho purisa, pamadavataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
mn130:5.16: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
mn130:5.17: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam, tayavetam papakammam katam, tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
mn130:6.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja dutiyam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva tatiyam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
mn130:6.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu tatiyam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
mn130:6.6: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu itthim va purisam va abadhikam dukkhitam balhagilanam sake muttakarise palipannam semanam annehi vutthapiyamanam annehi samvesiyamanan’ti?
mn130:6.10: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
mn130:6.12: Handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa’ti? So evamaha:
mn130:6.15: ‘ambho purisa, pamadavataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
mn130:6.16: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
mn130:6.17: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam, tayavetam papakammam katam, tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
mn130:7.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja tatiyam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva catuttham devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
mn130:7.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu catuttham devadutam patubhutan’ti?
mn130:7.6: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu rajano coram agucarim gahetva vividha kammakarana karente—
mn130:7.7: kasahipi talente vettehipi talente addhadandakehipi talente hatthampi chindante padampi chindante hatthapadampi chindante kannampi chindante nasampi chindante kannanasampi chindante bilangathalikampi karonte sankhamundikampi karonte rahumukhampi karonte jotimalikampi karonte hatthapajjotikampi karonte erakavattikampi karonte cirakavasikampi karonte eneyyakampi karonte balisamamsikampi karonte kahapanikampi karonte kharapatacchikampi karonte palighaparivattikampi karonte palalapithakampi karonte tattenapi telena osincante sunakhehipi khadapente jivantampi sule uttasente asinapi sisam chindante’ti?
mn130:7.11: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
mn130:7.12: ye kira, bho, papakani kammani karonti te dittheva dhamme evarupa vividha kammakarana kariyanti, kimangam pana parattha. Handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa’ti?
mn130:7.16: ‘ambho purisa, pamadavataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
mn130:7.17: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
mn130:7.18: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam, tayavetam papakammam katam, tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
mn130:8.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja catuttham devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva pancamam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
mn130:8.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu pancamam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
mn130:8.6: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu itthim va purisam va ekahamatam va dvihamatam va tihamatam va uddhumatakam vinilakam vipubbakajatan’ti?
mn130:8.10: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
mn130:8.11: ahampi khomhi maranadhammo, maranam anatito. Handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa’ti?
mn130:8.15: ‘ambho purisa, pamadavataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
mn130:8.16: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
mn130:8.17: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam, tayavetam papakammam katam, tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
mn130:9.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja pancamam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva tunhi hoti.
mn130:10.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala pancavidhabandhanam nama kammakaranam karonti—
mn130:10.2: tattam ayokhilam hatthe gamenti, tattam ayokhilam dutiye hatthe gamenti, tattam ayokhilam pade gamenti, tattam ayokhilam dutiye pade gamenti, tattam ayokhilam majjheurasmim gamenti.
mn130:10.3: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:11.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala samvesetva kutharihi tacchanti …pe…
mn130:12.1: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala uddhampadam adhosiram gahetva vasihi tacchanti …pe…
mn130:13.1: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala rathe yojetva adittaya pathaviya sampajjalitaya sajotibhutaya sarentipi, paccasarentipi …pe…
mn130:14.1: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala mahantam angarapabbatam adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam aropentipi oropentipi …pe…
mn130:15.1: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala uddhampadam adhosiram gahetva tattaya lohakumbhiya pakkhipanti adittaya sampajjalitaya sajotibhutaya.
mn130:15.3: So tattha phenuddehakam paccamano sakimpi uddham gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriyam gacchati.
mn130:15.4: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:17.1: Tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, mahanirayassa puratthimaya bhittiya acci utthahitva pacchimaya bhittiya patihannati, pacchimaya bhittiya acci utthahitva puratthimaya bhittiya patihannati, uttaraya bhittiya acci utthahitva dakkhinaya bhittiya patihannati, dakkhinaya bhittiya acci utthahitva uttaraya bhittiya patihannati, hettha acci utthahitva upari patihannati, uparito acci utthahitva hettha patihannati.
mn130:17.2: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:18.1: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yam kadaci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena tassa mahanirayassa puratthimam dvaram apapuriyati.
mn130:18.3: Tassa sighena javena dhavato chavimpi dayhati, cammampi dayhati, mamsampi dayhati, nharumpi dayhati, atthinipi sampadhupayanti, ubbhatam tadisameva hoti.
mn130:18.4: Yato ca kho so, bhikkhave, bahusampatto hoti, atha tam dvaram pidhiyati.
mn130:18.5: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:18.6: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yam kadaci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena tassa mahanirayassa pacchimam dvaram apapuriyati …pe…
mn130:18.10: Tassa sighena javena dhavato chavimpi dayhati, cammampi dayhati, mamsampi dayhati, nharumpi dayhati, atthinipi sampadhupayanti, ubbhatam tadisameva hoti.
mn130:18.11: Yato ca kho so, bhikkhave, bahusampatto hoti, atha tam dvaram pidhiyati.
mn130:18.12: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:19.1: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yam kadaci karahaci dighassa addhuno accayena tassa mahanirayassa puratthimam dvaram apapuriyati.
mn130:19.3: Tassa sighena javena dhavato chavimpi dayhati, cammampi dayhati, mamsampi dayhati, nharumpi dayhati, atthinipi sampadhupayanti, ubbhatam tadisameva hoti.
mn130:20.1: Tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, mahanirayassa samanantara sahitameva mahanto guthanirayo.
mn130:20.3: Tasmim kho pana, bhikkhave, guthaniraye sucimukha pana chavim chindanti, chavim chetva cammam chindanti, cammam chetva mamsam chindanti, mamsam chetva nharum chindanti, nharum chetva atthim chindanti, atthim chetva atthiminjam khadanti.
mn130:20.4: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:21.1: Tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, guthanirayassa samanantara sahitameva mahanto kukkulanirayo.
mn130:21.3: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:22.1: Tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, kukkulanirayassa samanantara sahitameva mahantam simbalivanam uddham yojanamuggatam solasangulakantakam adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam.
mn130:22.3: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:23.1: Tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, simbalivanassa samanantara sahitameva mahantam asipattavanam.
mn130:23.3: Tassa vateritani pattani patitani hatthampi chindanti, padampi chindanti, hatthapadampi chindanti, kannampi chindanti, nasampi chindanti, kannanasampi chindanti.
mn130:23.4: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:24.1: Tassa kho pana, bhikkhave, asipattavanassa samanantara sahitameva mahati kharodaka nadi.
mn130:24.3: So tattha anusotampi vuyhati, patisotampi vuyhati, anusotapatisotampi vuyhati.
mn130:24.4: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:25.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala balisena uddharitva thale patitthapetva evamahamsu:
mn130:25.5: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala tattena ayosankuna mukham vivaritva adittena sampajjalitena sajotibhutena tattam lohagulam mukhe pakkhipanti adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam.
mn130:25.6: So tassa otthampi dahati, mukhampi dahati, kanthampi dahati, urampi dahati, antampi antagunampi adaya adhobhaga nikkhamati.
mn130:25.7: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:26.5: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala tattena ayosankuna mukham vivaritva adittena sampajjalitena sajotibhutena tattam tambaloham mukhe asincanti adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam.
mn130:26.6: Tam tassa otthampi dahati, mukhampi dahati, kanthampi dahati, urampi dahati, antampi antagunampi adaya adhobhaga nikkhamati.
mn130:26.7: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vedeti, na ca tava kalam karoti, yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
mn130:27.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala puna mahaniraye pakkhipanti.
mn130:28.2: ‘ye kira, bho, loke papakani akusalani kammani karonti te evarupa vividha kammakarana kariyanti.
mn130:28.3: Aho vataham manussattam labheyyam. Tathagato ca loke uppajjeyya araham sammasambuddho. Tancaham bhagavantam payirupaseyyam.
mn130:28.4: So ca me bhagava dhammam deseyya. Tassa caham bhagavato dhammam ajaneyyan’ti.
mn130:29.1: Tam kho panaham, bhikkhave, nannassa samanassa va brahmanassa va sutva vadami, api ca yadeva samam natam samam dittham samam viditam tadevaham vadami”ti.
mn130:30.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
